ingredients.ingredient: 4 pounds kielbasa (Polish) sausage (such as Hillshire FarmÂ®), cut into 1/2 inch pieces

cookingTips: Combine grape jelly and barbecue sauce before adding kielbasa for smooth mixing

Keep warm on low setting during the game for easy serving throughout
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How could you adapt this recipe with different jelly or sauce flavors for variety at future gatherings?
